PHPViewWidgets\Widgets
namespace
PHPViewWidgets\Widgets
PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\UIScript

This class represents a script widget, this class IS NOT a container class

Information
Extends

PHPViewWidgets\Widgets\UIWidget

Options

This class accepts the following options:

src

An optional src attribute

type

An optional type attribute

other

An optional attribute to added verbatium

string

An optional string, that represents the any script between the open and close tags
